overview: UKI’s storyline unfolds as we follow a defunct replicant REIKO dumped on Etrashville - a vast dump for tech - who tries to pull themselves back together with the help of Etrashville's transgenic inhabitants. Parallel to REIKO’s trajectory is that of an infected city where we are made aware of the reckless schemes of the biotech enterprise, GENOM Co.
tagline: A Scifi Viral Alt-Reality Cinema. This is not Sex. This is Love. Set your electric sheep free range. It is 2060, what do you do with expired humanoids?
title: UKI
